attributes.action: call upon the Speaker of the House of Commons to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The need for this is self evident:  his attempts to block the publication of MPs' expenses, his abuse of MPs who defended publication.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
